package.description:
This project implements the guts of an rete matching algorithm: All the base classes for Alpha- and Beta-Nodes and -Memories, WorkingMemoryElements, Tokens and ProductionNodes. A sample implementation of the abstract classes is given to process RDF Triples.
Furthermore, it contains a rule reasoner based on the rete network that keeps track of the origins of facts (WMEs) and can handle retraction of facts.
package.author: Nils Niemann/nils.niemann@dfki.de
